summary: Card Games (Rummy, Teen Patti, Poker) feature testing complete. 24/24 backend API tests PASSED (100%). Frontend UI verified working: Game Hub page loads at /games, all 3 game types display with correct rewards, Quick Play creates rooms, WebSocket connects successfully, Game Room shows player list with host badge.
critical_code_review_comments: All Card Games features implemented correctly
Game Config API returns correct rewards (Rummy: 50/20/5, Teen Patti: 40/15/5, Poker: 60/25/5)
All games are FREE to play (coins_to_play: 0) - correct per spec
Room creation works for both public and private rooms
Quick Play correctly creates or joins existing rooms
WebSocket connection establishes successfully with 'Connected' status
Game Room UI shows player list with 'You' and 'Host' badges
Start game correctly requires minimum players (Rummy: 2, Teen Patti: 3, Poker: 2)
User stats API returns correct structure (games_played, games_won, win_rate, total_coins_earned)
Join by code correctly rejects invalid room codes (404)
Leaderboard endpoints work for all game types

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All Card Games UI features working

seed_data_creation: Test created multiple game rooms (Rummy, Teen Patti, Poker) during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Card Games feature fully tested. Backend APIs verified: /api/games/config, /api/games/{game_type}/info, /api/games/{game_type}/rooms/create, /api/games/{game_type}/quick-play, /api/games/{game_type}/stats/my, /api/games/{game_type}/leaderboard, /api/games/rooms/join-by-code. WebSocket endpoint at /api/games/ws/{room_id} connects successfully. Multiplayer gameplay (starting game, card actions) requires at least 2 connected players.

backend.GET /api/games/config: PASS - Returns all 3 game types with correct rewards
backend.GET /api/games/rummy/info: PASS - Returns hand rankings and FREE entry
backend.GET /api/games/{type}/stats/my: PASS - Returns user stats for each game type
backend.POST /api/games/rooms/join-by-code: PASS - Validates room codes (404 for invalid)

frontend.Card Games Hub (/games): PASS - Shows all 3 game types with icons, descriptions, rewards
frontend.Game Selection: PASS - Clicking game card shows Quick Play, Create Public/Private buttons
frontend.Quick Play: PASS - Creates room and navigates to Game Room page
frontend.Game Room: PASS - Shows Connected status, player list with host badge
frontend.Join Private Room: PASS - Shows room code input with Join/Cancel buttons
frontend.Your Active Games: PASS - Lists all rooms user is in with status and player count

websocket_testing.status: Shows 'Connected' badge in UI when WebSocket is established
websocket_testing.note: Full multiplayer gameplay (dealing cards, player actions) requires 2+ connected players
